name: Fantastic Beasts and how to save them
name_original: Fantastic Beasts and how to save them
description:
A 2D platformer game based on the movie Fantastic Beasts and where to find them.
Made for an university project.

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys - Movement
  • Up / Down (HOLD) - Look top/bottom
  • Space - Jump
  • A - Melee Attack
  • D - Magic Spell
  • S - Shield
  • W (Air) - Swooping Evil Rope
  • W (Ground) - Create/Destroy Swooping Evil Platform
